name: Alfred's Adventure
overview: Alfred's Adventure stars our 'plucky' hero Alfred Chicken. Alfred must battle his way North, South, West and Easter through 11 platforms based levels, full of hidden and power ups. He must rescue Billy Egg who has been 'poached' by the fowl Meka-Chickens for their bizarre cloning 'eggs-periment'. Alfred, the all round good egg, must stop their evil bid to take over the world but surely he's up to the task. After all, he's not chicken... is he?
